scripts.build: rimraf ../../dist/packages/pdf-util/cjs && npx tsc src/index.ts --outDir ../../dist/packages/pdf-util/cjs --lib esnext --moduleResolution node --downlevelIteration --esModuleInterop --target es2022 --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --skipLibCheck --importHelpers --moduleResolution node --sourceMap --module commonjs --declaration --declarationMap
